short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scrape Commenter info from Your Target Post in Twitter (Pure js/no API/no behind the scenes activities)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Scrape commenters (page id/page name) from any Twitter post "Your Posts / Others Posts"

Super Easy:
1.Open Twitter website (x.com) and login into your desired account
2.Open the post you want to scrape its commenters
3.Click on the extension start button
-> All commenters' name will be extracted and will be saved into your Downloads folder as a TXT file.

Completely FREE

A small part of Twitter Auto Activities Package (from v-User)
v-user.com/twitter
